project_descr:
SSR Phase II will support the GoI in three main ways:
1-	To implement the NSS as it relates to SSR 
2-	Strengthen democratic oversight of the security sector
3-	Enhance civil engagement with the security sector

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: The GoI Plan for Security Sector Reform is developed.
Output 2: The democratic oversight capacity of the SDC is strengthened.
Output 3. GoI engagement with civil society in the field of SSR is increased.
